name: SP Tamim

name: SiZuKa
say: If you need a powerful PC for your work-from-home setup, we’ve compiled a list of the best desktop computers currently on sale from major retailers.

name: Pikachu
say: Small but packed with full-bore desktop components, Maingear's Turbo gaming desktop delivers exquisite performance. It's the ultimate compact gamer, if you can withstand the sticker shock.

name: de Villers
say: Want to do some PC gaming, or do you spend time editing photos or video? You'll want to level up the preceding configuration with more RAM and better graphics options. Expect price points to be between $800 and $1,200 -- and even higher if you go for a more bleeding-edge video card.
